name: Build And Shoot (itch)
description:
Our entry for the game jam. The theme : Build and rebuild

This is the work of 3 devs. No external help (assets...).

How to play

PC :

Arrow to move.

Space to shoot.

Mobile :

Right : right part of the screen

Left : left part of the screen

Shoot : bottom of the screen

Start the game : Tap in the middle of the screen

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 1 : Build.

Bricks are falling from the sky. You have to put a few of them in the right place.

Step 2 : Shoot.

Destroy the bricks who are in the wrong place (red mark).

Destroy the unused bricks to elevate the score.

Step 3 : Do it again.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Level Design & art : allalonegamez       

Programming & Level Design :  RenaudME

Music : Conway & Benny

Follow me on twitter & itch.

More informations : The highest score is at the top of the screen. The number of the level is at the bottom.

Screen resolution of the NES with pixel art heavily influenced by the game boy & pico-8.

Thanks for playing!
